## DisplayableFacet.options property

An array of [FacetOption](./answers-core.facetoption.md)<!-- -->s

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
options: DisplayableFacetOption[];
```

## Remarks

To indicate that a facet should be disabled, supply an empty array
